p:
The RRDE experiments were conducted in a usual H‐Cell under argon atmosphere. The Au working electrode (WE), Au counter electrode (CE) and Ag reference electrode (RE) were connected to a bipotentiostat (TACUSSEL BIPAD B1), while electrode rotator was connected to a PINE rotation control. Counter electrode was a gold sheet and the reference electrode was a silver wire immersed into 0.1 m AgNO 3 containing DMSO. Disc currents were normalized to the geometrical surface area of the disk electrode (
A
g e o
d i s k
); ring currents were normalized not only to the collection efficiency
N 0
but also to the geometrical surface area of the disk electrode (
A
g e o
d i s k
) for 1 to 1 comparability.
